name: Adventure Medical Kits Moleskin Pre-Cut Blister Dressings
description: Prevention is better than cure, especially when it comes to blisters. These moleskin patches are pre-cut to fit common problem areas. Apply them when you feel a hotspot or where you know from experience you’re susceptible to blisters.Includes alcohol wipes for surface preparation.2 x large oval, 4.4 x 7.6cm.4 x medium oval, 2.5 x 5cm.4 x medium toe, 2.5 x 3.5cm.6 x small toe, 1.9 x 2.5cm.6 x small strips, 1.3 x 3.5cm.
